FuncDef: This command sets the recovery time to be negotiated via RFC 4951. It represents the extra time this L2TP peer (LAC or LNS) needs to recover all its tunnels.

ParaDef.Info: The period of time, expressed in seconds, an endpoint asks its peer to wait before assuming the recovery process has failed. Values-0 to 900.

ExtraInfo: Default: recovery-time 0 on config>router>l2tp>failover and config>service>vprn>l2tp>failover
